ThingsGateway.Foundation.Dlt645.DltResou.AddressDes:
Data identification address

Refer to accompanying documents or related materials. Below are some common data identification addresses

Address                       Description
-----------------------------------------
02010100    Phase A voltage
02020100    Phase A current
02030000    Instantaneous total active power
00000000    (Current) Total active energy
00010000    (Current) Forward active energy
ThingsGateway.Foundation.Dlt645.DltResou.FunctionNotSame: Inconsistent function code, requested function code {0}, returned function code {1}
ThingsGateway.Foundation.Dlt645.DltResou.DataIdNotSame: Returned data identification does not comply with the rules
ThingsGateway.Foundation.Dlt645.DltResou.CountError: Number of parameters written does not meet address requirements
ThingsGateway.Foundation.Dlt645.DltResou.Error3: Excessive number of daily time periods
ThingsGateway.Foundation.Dlt645.DltResou.Error4: Excessive number of yearly time zones
